article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XFzFtc hentry entry story-marquee-standard

h2.a: What It's Like To Die

div.p: The stories you hear about people dying usually end with tunnels and lights and flashbacks and God and big epiphanies. This isn't what happened to me.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XFzFtc&via=Digg&text=What It's Like To Die

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZNzeZA hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: MORE IMPORTANT THAN YOUR NCAA BRACKET

h2.a: Is Darth Vader The World's Favorite 'Star Wars' Character?

div.p: It's Light Side vs. Dark Side in Lucasfilm's "This is Madness" tournament-bracket style competition to see who is the all-time favorite "Star Wars" character.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZNzeZA&via=Digg&text=Is Darth Vader The World's Favorite 'Star Wars' Character?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Xch8Py hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: YOU CAN'T SAY THEY'RE NOT CREATIVE

h2.a: 10 Crazy Gun Laws Introduced Since Newtown

div.p: Anger management classes for ammo buyers? Felony charges for authors of gun control bills? Seriously?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xch8Py&via=Digg&text=10 Crazy Gun Laws Introduced Since Newtown

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YdWYrG hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Know Your Bushwicks From Your Bed-Stuys With This Addicting Online Game

div.p: Click That 'Hood lets you learn how well you know the neighborhoods of your city (and many others across the country). How local are you?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YdWYrG&via=Digg&text=Know Your Bushwicks From Your Bed-Stuys With This Addicting Online Game

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YznRpl hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Russia's Newest Folk Hero Is A Car-Crushing Bus Driver Called 'The Punisher'

div.p: This is Alexei Volkov, known in Zelenograd as "The Punisher." When he gets cut off in traffic, he punishes the offending driver. With over 100 crashes, he is fast becoming the city's newest folk hero.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YznRpl&via=Digg&text=Russia's Newest Folk Hero Is A Car-Crushing Bus Driver Called 'The Punisher'

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z3B9aj hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: SO HOT IT MADE A CAMEO ON 'SEINFELD'

h2.a: 15 Years Ago, Apple Killed The Twentieth Anniversary Mac

div.p: Don't remember this $7,499 Mac from the '90s? Check out this gallery and video.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z3B9aj&via=Digg&text=15 Years Ago, Apple Killed The Twentieth Anniversary Mac

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XOqOmS hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: 50 Most Realistic Minecraft Creations

div.p: The fact that these creations exist in the game help to explain why the game Minecraft has become such a breakout hit and adored by fans all over the internet. The world is your sandbox, and no where is this more true than in Minecraft.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XOqOmS&via=Digg&text=50 Most Realistic Minecraft Creations

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YvmHeg hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Think AirPlay Sucks? This Can Help

div.p: Watch any movie file on your Apple TV without hassle. No need to convert the video or jailbreak your Apple TV.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YvmHeg&via=Digg&text=Think AirPlay Sucks? This Can Help

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZG4Pv2 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Who Will Be The Next Alex Trebek?

div.p: Sony Pictures TV is casting a wide net in its search for a successor to Alex Trebek as host of one of the studio’s top properties, veteran game show 'Jeopardy!'.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZG4Pv2&via=Digg&text=Who Will Be The Next Alex Trebek?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YzF1Tu hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Happy 28th Birthday To The Internet's First Domain Name

div.p: The entire Internet forgot it was grandpa's birthday today. Symbolics.com—the first domain name ever registered—turned 28 today, and just about no one had anything nice to say.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YzF1Tu&via=Digg&text=Happy 28th Birthday To The Internet's First Domain Name

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15QIgZZ hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Ennio Morricone: I'll Never Work With Tarantino Again

div.p: The 84-year-old conductor, who has worked with the "Django Unchained" director on four films, says he uses music "without coherence."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15QIgZZ&via=Digg&text=Ennio Morricone: I'll Never Work With Tarantino Again

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YzabdX hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Mike Tyson's One Man Show

div.p: Only in Mike Tyson's America could a convicted rapist stand in front of a projection screen and pour his heart out to a packed house, because Mike Tyson's story only makes sense in this America, where Odysseus climbs back within himself and where the sirens sing in the heavily codified language of therapy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YzabdX&via=Digg&text=Mike Tyson's One Man Show

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12VT5MF hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: NO, THEY DIDN'T USE THOSE DVDs

h2.a: China Is Engineering Genius Babies

div.p: Chinese scientists have collected DNA samples from 2,000 of the world’s smartest people and are sequencing their entire genomes in an attempt to identify the alleles that determine human intelligence. This will allow parents to pick their brightest zygote and bump up every generation's intelligence by five to 15 IQ points.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12VT5MF&via=Digg&text=China Is Engineering Genius Babies

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WKCBUM hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Secret Society At Center Of Uproar On Georgetown's Campus

div.p: An anonymous blogger discovered the Second Stewards Society's internal e-mails and published the most amusing material: members deliberating over which ties to wear (Brooks Brothers) and venting about the “extremely left-wing tilt” of the Georgetown campus tour.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WKCBUM&via=Digg&text=Secret Society At Center Of Uproar On Georgetown's Campus

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XEvJcd hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Spiders Like You've Never Seen Them Before

div.p: Spiders don't always have to look so creepy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XEvJcd&via=Digg&text=Spiders Like You've Never Seen Them Before

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XDWCwZ hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: Rail Project Accidentally Uncovers Mass 'Black Death' Grave

div.p: Archaeologists said on Friday they had discovered a lost burial ground during excavations for a massive new rail project in London which might hold the bodies of some 50,000 people who were killed by the "Black Death" plague more than 650 years ago.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XDWCwZ&via=Digg&text=Rail Project Accidentally Uncovers Mass 'Black Death' Grave

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-15Qwq1L hentry entry story-col-0

h2.a: Syria’s War Revealed in Satellite Imagery

div.p: On the world map, Syria remains a country. On the ground, it has devolved into a battlefield warred over by sectarian fiefdoms, guerrilla outfits, extremist militias, criminal gangs and a regime clinging grimly to its dwindling sources of power and legitimacy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15Qwq1L&via=Digg&text=Syria’s War Revealed in Satellite Imagery

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YxW88h hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Science Of Hair Loss

div.p: Is male pattern baldness really passed down from your mother's father?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YxW88h&via=Digg&text=The Science Of Hair Loss

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-YvH0VK hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: WHAT DO THEY USE THOSE BALLOONS FOR?

h2.a: Porn Without The Stars: Sex-Free Photos Delve Into Fetish Fortress' Wacky Past

div.p: Without knowing what the photos are, there’s little to give away that they’re film sets at Kink.com, an online pornography company. There are small hints, but nothing screams sex.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YvH0VK&via=Digg&text=Porn Without The Stars: Sex-Free Photos Delve Into Fetish Fortress' Wacky Past

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Z1JGKN hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: AND CAN SOMEONE MAKE AN LTE VERSION?

h2.a: Who Made That Cellphone?

div.p: The first cellphone, weighing more than two pounds, had all the sex appeal of a doorstop. Still, it was a triumph of engineering.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z1JGKN&via=Digg&text=Who Made That Cellphone?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-Yz2XGA hentry entry story-col-1

header.div: EVERY AMERICAN COP IS SECRETLY JEALOUS

h2.a: Reporter Detained By Chinese Police During Live Report

div.p: Correspondent Mark Stone and his crew from U.K. cable news channel Sky News were detained by Chinese Police on live television this morning.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yz2XGA&via=Digg&text=Reporter Detained By Chinese Police During Live Report

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-10HOAA5 hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: How Irish Are McDonald's Shamrock Shakes, Anyway?

div.p: Ah, the Shamrock Shake. This limited-time-only cup of swirly mint goodness is McDonald's small way of paying ode to St. Patrick's Day, but is it Irish at all?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10HOAA5&via=Digg&text=How Irish Are McDonald's Shamrock Shakes, Anyway?

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-ZTdEFv hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: WE'D EAT THAT GUY FIRST, FOR SURE

h2.a: What People In Elevators Think

div.p: The rule is stop, drop and roll, right?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZTdEFv&via=Digg&text=What People In Elevators Think

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16xwXXJ hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: Dropbox Acquires Email App Mailbox

div.p: Dropbox has announced that it has acquired email app Mailbox after the app hit the market nearly one month ago to much critical acclaim.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16xwXXJ&via=Digg&text=Dropbox Acquires Email App Mailbox

div.p: Could a spongy musical instrument hold the future of computer interaction?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10VUVeX&via=Digg&text=Qwerty Keyboards: Time For A Rethink?

h2.a: This 'Game Of Thrones'/'Princess Bride' Mash-Up Is Perfect

div.p: In another world, a young Fred Savage received a much different book from his doting grandpa.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z3ATbm&via=Digg&text=This 'Game Of Thrones'/'Princess Bride' Mash-Up Is Perfect

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-12Smg35 hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: The Beatles' Secretary Finally Talks

div.p: Freda Kelly was just 17 when the Beatles made her their secretary. After years of silence, she's finally talking about what it was like to hold the most highly-coveted secretarial job of the 20th century.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12Smg35&via=Digg&text=The Beatles' Secretary Finally Talks

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WKtkft hentry entry story-col-2

h2.a: 14 Adults 'Cured' Of HIV

div.p: Two weeks after the revelation that a baby has been "cured" of HIV, reports suggest that a similar treatment can cure some adults too.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WKtkft&via=Digg&text=14 Adults 'Cured' Of HIV

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-XhKoKj hentry entry story-col-0

header.div: WHAT IT'S LIKE TO LIVE IN SOLITARY

h2.a: A Sentence Worse Than Death

div.p: Sentenced to 77 years to life, William Blake has no chance of ever leaving prison alive, and almost no chance of ever leaving solitary—-a fate he considers “a sentence worse than death.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XhKoKj&via=Digg&text=A Sentence Worse Than Death

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-16wBfij hentry entry story-col-1

h2.a: These Are The World's 10 Best Drinking Nations

div.p: St Patrick's Day is upon us again. Time for the drinking world to pull on an unamusing leprechaun hat and order pints of the black stuff in a fake Irish accent. But why do we only celebrate the Emerald Isle's contribution to conviviality when there are other nations out there who love to wallow in drink just as much?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/16wBfij&via=Digg&text=These Are The World's 10 Best Drinking Nations

article.class: story-container digg-story-el story-WhT4Pa hentry entry story-col-2

header.div: NOW YOU REALLY KNOW WHAT IT'S LIKE

h2.a: The People Living A Celibate Life

div.p: Have you ever wondered what it's like living a celibate life? Hear from some people who made that exact choice.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WhT4Pa&via=Digg&text=The People Living A Celibate Life
